## Load libraries

```{r}
options(scipen = 999)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Loading data

```{r}
wbb_rosters_2023_24 <- read_csv("data/wbb_rosters_2023_24.csv")

```

Our dataset has already been cleaned. There are columns with cleaned versions of all variables, including year, hometown, state, etc.
